scripts.package: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp common.sp dist/ && cp -r src/modules dist/modules && cp package.json dist/ && pkg ./dist --output bin/sprig
scripts.deploy: sudo npm run package && npm run bin
scripts.package:win: rmdir /s /q dist && tsc && copy common.sp dist\ && xcopy src\modules dist\modules /E /I && copy package.json dist\ && pkg ./dist --output bin\sprig
scripts.deploy:win: npm run package:win && npm run bin:win
